Field Detail

pickUpText

private java.lang.String pickUpText
This field holds the text that will be displayed to the Player when this Item is is picked up.

initialPickUpText

private java.lang.String initialPickUpText
This field holds the text that will be displayed to the Player when this Item is is picked up for the first time. Afterwards, the pickup text is used instead.

weight

private int weight
This field holds the value for this Item's weight.

pickedUp

private boolean pickedUp
This field holds whether this Item has been marked as previously picked up by the Player.

movable

private boolean movable
This field holds whether this Item has been marked as movable or not.

hidden

private boolean hidden
This field holds whether this Item has been marked as hidden or not.

Item

public Item()
This constructor initializes all the fields for this class and adds this Item to the Level.gameObjects list.

Method Detail

pickUpText

public void pickUpText(java.lang.String newPickUpText)
This setter method is used to set the text to be displayed when this GameItem is added to the player's inventory.

Specified by:
pickUpText in interface GameItem
Parameters:
newPickUpText - The text to set as the pickup text for this GameItem.

initialPickUpText

public void initialPickUpText(java.lang.String newPickUpText)
This setter method is used to set the text to be displayed when this GameItem is added to the player's inventory for the first time. It is usually a bit longer and more descriptive than the standard pickup text.

Specified by:
initialPickUpText in interface GameItem
Parameters:
newPickUpText - The text to set as the initial pickup text for this GameItem.

hidden

public void hidden(boolean isHidden)
This setter method is used to set whether this GameItem is marked as hidden or not.

Specified by:
hidden in interface GameItem
Parameters:
isHidden - The boolean value to set this GameItem's hidden status to.

weight

public void weight(int newWeight)
This setter method is used to assign a new weight to this GameItem.

Specified by:
weight in interface GameItem
Parameters:
newWeight - The new weight to be assigned.

movable

public void movable(boolean movability)
This setter method is used to set whether this GameItem is marked as movable or not.

Specified by:
movable in interface GameItem
Parameters:
movability - The boolean value to set this GameItem's movability to.

pickUpText

public java.lang.String pickUpText()
This getter method gets the text that will be displayed to the Player when this GameItem is added to their inventory. If this GameItem is not marked as having been picked up previously by the Player, the initial pickup text is used.

Specified by:
pickUpText in interface GameItem
Returns:
The String of text to be displayed.

weight

public int weight()
This getter method gets how much this GameItem weighs. This is used to figure out how many GameItems the Player is allowed to carry.

Specified by:
weight in interface GameItem
Returns:
The weight assigned to this GameItem.

isHidden

public boolean isHidden()
This is used to check if this GameItem is marked as hidden.

Specified by:
isHidden in interface GameItem
Returns:
True if this GameItem is marked as hidden, false otherwise.

isMovable

public boolean isMovable()
This is used to check if this GameItem is marked as movable. Items that are marked as not movable can not be picked up or moved by the Player.

Specified by:
isMovable in interface GameItem
Returns:
True if this item is movable, false otherwise.

hidden

public boolean hidden()
This method is used to check whether this GameItem is marked as hidden or not.

Specified by:
hidden in interface GameItem
Returns:
True if this GameItem is marked as hidden, false otherwise.
